prompt: Photorealistic medium shot of Dr. Lori Verderame, a female antiques appraiser with short blonde hair, intently examining an intricate 18th-century porcelain figurine using a jeweler's loupe. She is seated at a polished wooden table. Soft, directional lighting highlights the details of the figurine and her focused expression. The background is a subtly blurred collection of antique artifacts on shelves, creating a shallow depth of field. Professional photography style, capturing expertise and concentration. --ar 16:9 --style raw

prompt: Wide-angle photorealistic shot of an antiques appraisal event. Dr. Lori Verderame stands behind a table laden with various objects, holding up a vintage painting and addressing a diverse, attentive audience seated in rows before her. The setting is a well-lit community hall or event space. The composition captures both Dr. Lori engaging with the crowd and the audience's reaction. Bright, even lighting suitable for public events. Professional event photography style. --ar 16:9 --style raw

prompt: Photorealistic depiction of an antique appraiser's sophisticated home office or study. Focus on a large mahogany desk cluttered with reference books, auction catalogs, a magnifying glass, calipers, and a laptop displaying valuation data. Antique ceramics and glassware are visible on bookshelves lining the walls. Warm, atmospheric lighting emanates from a green banker's lamp on the desk and soft daylight from a window to the side. No people visible. Detailed, scholarly ambiance. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: lori-antique-appraiser-image-3.png

prompt: Detailed close-up, photorealistic shot focusing on an ornate, tarnished silver pocket watch resting on a dark velvet cloth. The hands of Dr. Lori Verderame, professional and careful, are visible gently opening the watch cover or pointing to an engraving with a gloved finger. Macro photography style with extremely sharp focus on the watch details and textures. Dramatic, low-key lighting emphasizes the craftsmanship and age of the object. Shallow depth of field blurs the background. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: lori-antique-appraiser-image-4.png

prompt: Cinematic, photorealistic image of Dr. Lori Verderame standing confidently on a brightly lit stage, speaking into a microphone. She wears professional attire. In the background, slightly out of focus, are elements suggesting a television studio or large auditorium setting, like stage lights, trusses, or camera equipment silhouettes. Dynamic lighting highlights her as the central figure. The wide 16:9 aspect ratio captures the scale of the stage environment and her commanding presence as a public speaker and media personality. --ar 16:9 --style raw
